item.title: Report I-2025010091
item.description:
Report I-2025010091

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-01T00:52:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-10
  • City: Pottstown
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: RSI LEASING INC NS TBT
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Butyl Acrylate was being transferrd by pump from tank car to trailer. A control valve was set in the wrong position, allowing product to flow through the system without beiong metered. Additionally, the overfill protection device was set at a level that was too high in the trailer. This allowed the trialer to fill beyond capacity before shutting down the process.

item.title: Report X-2025011163
item.description:
Report X-2025011163

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-27
  • City: CARLISLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING CLOUDIES CLOUD BREAD. THIS PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS SEVERAL PACKS OF NON-REGULATED NORDIC ICE PACKS. OUTER BOX HAS KEEP FROZEN AND PERISHABLE STICKERS APPLIED BUT NO INDICATION DRY ICE WAS BEING USED TO COOL THE PRODUCT. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

  • Description: REPORTED TO DOOR 454. WEARING PROPER PPE USED THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONCE SHEETS FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUID. BOX WAS ON THE FLOOR IN THE TRAILER. WET SPOT ON SIDE AND BOTTOM OF BOX.NO LIQUID ON THE FLOOR NO NEED FOR ZEP ZORBENT. PLACED THE BOX IN A GREEN PLASTIC DMP BAG AND REMOVED IT TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
